text.text_translated:
Most people think developing countries are in a bad situation.  
They think people are very poor and dictators rule them.  
They think there is little hope for real change.  
But actually a big change is happening.  
In the last 20 years over 700 million people got more money.  
They are not poor now.  
Six million fewer children die each year from disease.  
Millions more girls are in school.  
Millions of people can get clean water.
